for i in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    if N % 2 == 0 and N == 2:
        print(N)
    elif N % 2 == 0 and N > 2:
        b = 1
        y = abs(N - 4)
        b += y / 2
        print(int(N - b))
    elif N % 2 != 0 and N >= 3:
        a = 1
        x = abs(N - 3)
        a += x / 2
        print(int(N - a))
